note.p: Birth: Attercliffe, near Sheffield, Yorkshire, England (28 November 1858)
Death: His house on Kingston Hill, Surrey (30 September 1940)
Obituaries: Obituary Notices of Fellows of the Royal Society 1939-1941 vol 3 pp 647-664, plate, by C H Desch
References: Geoffrey Tweedale, 'Sir Robert Abbott Hadfield FRS (1858-1940), and the Discovery of Manganese Steel' in NR 1985-86 vol 40 pp 63-74, plate
Paul A Tunbridge, 'Faraday's Genevese Friends' in NR 1972-3 vol 27 pp 263-298
